Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-6-1-2 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with one AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with three AccessPoints

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: No event with Topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" there is not an event with Topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Event tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is property event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is property event(MessageDescription.IsProperty="true")

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Source.SimpleItemDescription.Name in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Name = "AccessPointToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Source.SimpleItemDescription.Type in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Name in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event (CredentialToken)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Type in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event (CredentialToken)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Name in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event (CredentialHolderName)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Type in tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event (CredentialHolderName)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topictns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential is not topic
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" wstop:topic="false" fortns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Credential event

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: The Notify message is incorrect: not existing token

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: The Notify message with incorrect Source.SimpleItem.Name
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" The first Notify message has incorrect Name

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: The Notify message with incorrect Data.SimpleItem.Name (CredentialToken)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" The first Notify message has incorrect Name

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Data.SimpleItem.Name (CredentialHolderName) is absent in the notify
Test.Description: Correct response: The first Notify message without optional CredentialHolderName elemnt

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Data.SimpleItem.Name (CredentialHolderName) with empty value in the first notify
Test.Description: Correct response: The first Notify message has optional CredentialHolderName elemnt with empty value

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: No notyfy message
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT does not send the first notify message

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Notify message: not expexted event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT sends notify message with not expected event

Step.Notification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"> <Body> <Notify xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:tns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/topics">
<NotificationMessage xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2"> <SubscriptionReference> <Address xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">http://192.168.10.179</Address> <ReferenceParameters xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" /> <Metadata xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" /> </SubscriptionReference> <Topic Dialect="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tev/topicExpression/ConcreteSet" xmlns:tac="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/accesscontrol/wsdl">tns1:AccessControl/AccessGranted/Anonymous</Topic> <Message xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" > <Message xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" UtcTime="2008-10-10T12:24:57.321" Property="False"> <Source xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema"> <SimpleItem xmlns="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" Name="AccessPointToken" Value="tokenAccessPoint1"/> </Source> </Message> </Message> </NotificationMessage> </Notify> </Body> </Envelope>

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: The notification was received in bad time
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External" with Value="false"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: Event and Notification contains Data.SimpleItem item with Name="External"
Test.Description: Value of Data.SimpleItem with Name="External" is not equal to "false"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS GRANTED WITH CREDENTIAL EVENT
Test.Name: The DUT did not send a GetEventPropertiesResponse
